Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This unique offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece that promises unparalleled benefits and returns. Should you choose to accept this offer, it will not only fulfill your aspirations but also secure your position as a distinguished owner of our product. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
